data.text:
USPS is still experiencing a lot of delays due to the pandemic! We appreciate your patience with your orders as well as our restock times!

*Please limit your purchase of rare/oop items to one copy per title.

Sold out? Don't worry, we restock weekly!

Eleven-year-old Casey (Nathan Forrest Winters) has an intense fear of clowns. When his older brothers decide to take him to a traveling carnival, Casey's in for the most frightening time of his life. Things get even worse when three lunatics dressed in clown outfits go on a murderous rampage... right near the Casey's house! Brian McHugh and Sam Rockwell star. 81 min. Widescreen (Enhanced); Soundtrack: English. Region Free
